explains: adj. 住宅区的，居民区的 ；家庭的，住宅的；（为工作、学习或受人照料而）住宿（在某地）的
wordGroup: residential area 住宅区，居民区
residential property 住宅物业；住宅房地产
residential construction 住宅建设，居民住房建设；民用建筑住宅建设
residential quarter 居住小区，住宅区
residential mortgage 住宅抵押借款
residential heating n. 住宅供热

sentences.en: Most new residential buildings in Sweden are already heated with ground-source heat pumps.
sentences.cn: 在瑞典，大多数新建的住宅建筑都已经由地源热泵系统供暖。

sentences.en: Environmental organizations want to preserve the land surrounding the Wilgrinn Wilderness Area from residential development.
sentences.cn: 环保组织希望保护威尔格林荒野地区周围的土地不受住宅开发的影响。

sentences.en: Training involves a two-year residential course.
sentences.cn: 培训包括两年的住校课程。
